name: Eons Away
storyline: Eons Away is a solo-developed, turn-based RPG with unique combat mechanics. Explore a vibrant, handpainted world overshadowed by an encroaching corruption. Every decision is important, be it how you fight your battles or the bonds you make. Choose your path wisely.
